controllers

Class LibrarianController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.LibrarianController

  • public class LibrarianController
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Inna Controller class, containing all the functions regarding a librarian

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LibrarianController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void AddNewUser(int user_id)
      Function that gives the user permission, the librarian adds the user to the GoodReading by changing his _userstatus to disconnected
      static void EditCostumerAccount(int user_id)
      Function that update user account The function checks the validation account of the customer, If the account is valid, then the function changes hid _accountType according to what requested(monthly or yearly) and update the _endDate.
      static void EraseUser(int user_id)
      Function deletes the user from the system
      static void FromUserToCostumer(int user_id)
      Function that confirms the user to become a customer, The librarian gives confirmation to the customer by changing its _accountStatus to ACCOUNT_FULL_PERMISSION
      static SystemUser[] ViewUsersWithCondition(int viewStatus)
      Return a list of users or customers by viewStatus

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public static void AddNewUser(int user_id)
        Function that gives the user permission, the librarian adds the user to the GoodReading by changing his _userstatus to disconnected

      • FromUserToCostumer

        public static void FromUserToCostumer(int user_id)
        Function that confirms the user to become a customer, The librarian gives confirmation to the customer by changing its _accountStatus to ACCOUNT_FULL_PERMISSION
        Parameters:
        user_id - to know which user is selected

      • EditCostumerAccount

        public static void EditCostumerAccount(int user_id)
        Function that update user account The function checks the validation account of the customer, If the account is valid, then the function changes hid _accountType according to what requested(monthly or yearly) and update the _endDate.
        Parameters:
        user_id - to know which user is selected
